tweets.tweet: The LilyPond Blog is up and running here! Anyone can follow and leave comments on the blog. To contribute, contact Janek Warchoł.
Adam Spiers has build a web site which uses LilyPond to dynamically generate images of chords and scales called Scale matcher.
Ben Lemon has created some LilyPond tutorials on YouTube. Read about them on his blog.
Server Acim, composer and professor of Composition and Conducting in İnönü University - Malatya, Turkey, wrote the Turkish Ebook "GNU/LilyPond, Özgür Bir Nota Yazma Programı".
